channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Virtual Environments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Virtual Environments

item.title: CVE-2017-1378|2024-09-17T01:46:09.210Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20for%20virtual%20environments
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 (formerly Tivoli Storage Manager) disclosed unencrypted login credentials to Vmware vCenter in the application trace output which could be obtained by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 126875.
